title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4023.5 - Photographs of the finish
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4023.5 - Photographs of the finish

State Regulations
A camera selected by the association conducting the
meeting, if approved by the commission, shall be used to make a photograph or
photographs of the horses at the finish to assist the placing judges in
determining their positions as exclusively indicated by their
noses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4023.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
